description: A large amount of GOFIN files come included with DRUKI Gofin but additional GOFIN files may be download by the user from the Gofin database directly from the application. GOFIN files are saved in a proprietary format and DRUKI Gofin is the only known program that can open them.
NOTE: DRUKI Gofin is typically used by companies, accounting offices, and institutions.
